trans-unit.source: The abstract base class from which workflow roles are derived.
trans-unit.target: A classe base abstrata da qual as funções do fluxo de trabalho são derivadas.

trans-unit.source: You can derive classes from the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> class in order to implement role-based access to your workflows and their activities.
trans-unit.target: É possível derivar as classes a partir de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> classe para implementar o acesso baseado em função para seus fluxos de trabalho e suas atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> class and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> class derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> classe e o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> classe derivam de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> classe.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class gets the identities contained by this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada obtém as identidades contidas por esta <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A list of the names of the identities contained by this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista dos nomes das identidades contidas por esta <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the identity for which to test.
trans-unit.target: O nome da identidade cuja existência será testada.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, returns a value that indicates whether this role contains the specified identity.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, retorna um valor que indica se essa função contém a identidade especificada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="identity" /> is included in this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="identity" /> estiver incluída nesta <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole" />, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets or sets the name of this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, obtém ou define o nome desta <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole" />.
